import React, { useState } from 'react' import List from '@material-ui/core/List' import ListItem from '@material-ui/core/ListItem' import ListItemText from '@material-ui/core/ListItemText' import Collapse from '@material-ui/core/Collapse' import ExpandLess from '@material-ui/icons/ExpandLess' import ExpandMore from '@material-ui/icons/ExpandMore' import Drawer from '@material-ui/core/Drawer' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import menuItems from '../../data' const useStyles = makeStyles({ list: { width: '100%', position: 'relative', }, links: { textDecoration:'none', color: '#000', width: '100%', }, menuHeader: { paddingLeft: '30px', } }) function SubMenu(children) { const classes = useStyles() const [state, setState] = useState({}) const handleClick = (item) => { setState( prevState => ( { [ item ]: !prevState[ item ] } ) ) } return children.map(subOption => ( !subOption.children ?
:
handleClick( subOption.name ) }> { state[ subOption.name ] ? : } { SubMenu( subOption.children ) }
)) } const SimpleMenu = () => { const classes = useStyles() return (
{ SubMenu( menuItems.data ) }
) } export default SimpleMenu
